title: When I Summoned a Succubus S*ave, My Sister Is the One That Appeared - Novel Updates
tags: Brother Complex   Contracts   First-time Interc**rse   Incest   R-18   Short Story   Sister Complex   Succubus   Younger Sisters
author: Touzai Taskue   東西　太助
description: Among grandfather’s memento, I found an old notebook. It says『How to summon a succubus slave』…Of course, I tried it, for some reason my little sister, Yurika appeared.>
